text: @CNN And this kind of bogus insurance coverage is what we want to protect? Wrong! If covid-19 has taught us anything, it's given us a clear, wide open view of our dysfunctional healthcare system, especially in light of Trump's efforts 2undermine the ACA. VOTE JOE BIDEN in November!🇺🇸
